text: Bhabani Shankar Bhoi is an Indian politician. He was elected to the Odisha Legislative Assembly from Talsara (ST) in the 2019 Odisha Legislative Assembly election as a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party.My NetaOdisha Assembly election results 2019: Full list of winnersBattle 2019: BJP announces candidates for 99 MLA seats in OdishaHours After Fielding, JB Patnaik's Son Unwilling To Contest From Begunia ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sundergarh district Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Odisha Category:Odisha MLAs 2019–
title: Bhabani Shankar Bhoi
